content: On the externally facing piece, it's really geared our product at the heart of the market, understanding where the going using the insights we have across the whole portfolio and making and sure that we have the right product there, at the right margins to continue to meet the consumer, and I think that's where the strength of the portfolio has really play out over the last few years, and you've seen it, I mean, go three years back when we saw millennials really coming into entry level homes and we have the portfolio there to meet them and as they started to move up in this dollars float in and then you saw real trade off over the last couple of years, we can stretch the portfolio to meet them there.
